alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 9:19PM PDT until November 03 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 2 to 4 inches. Northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County and Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT Thursday, most significant from 2 am to 8 am Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with travel delays. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches possible on Interstate 5 around the Tejon Pass and Grapevine.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
